description: Famous for crispy dosas and South Indian breakfast in Bangalore.
Luxury hotel offering a comfortable stay with modern amenities in the heart of the city.
Beautiful and serene Krishna temple attracting devotees and tourists alike.
Hidden gem for traditional Brahmin-style home-cooked meals.
5-star hotel surrounded by lush greenery, known for its world-class service.
Historic temple known for its massive monolithic Ganesha idol.
